name: AITD
description:
TRANSMISSION INCOMING...

TRANSMISSION RECEIVED.

By the time you receive this message, I may already be dead, including my squad, if they aren't already. We did as we were told, clear out the hive and gather resources. We failed. When things got ugly, I took off. One of the beasts slashed me as I fled, and I busted my left leg running down hill. I'm alone in the dark. All I can do now is take out as many beasts as I can and pray that help will arrive.

END OF TRANSMISSION.

AITD - or project Alone in the Dark - is a survival horror game where positioning and timing are key, and listening closely will guarantee your survival. You must survive off the resources provided by dead beasts for as long as you can.

Please let me know what you think of the game in the comments below, and share your best survival time!
